name: real-ores
title: Real Ores
author: trikop
description:
(Work in progress mod. Playable, albeit maybe unbalanced currently)
Replaces vanilla ore patches with real counterparts (will have to make the extraction a little more complex in a future update)
Ore ratios are fetched from http://webmineral.com 

Full compatibility with other ore mods will be added in an later update
